basic.name: Flamestrike (Q)
basic.description: After 1 second, deal 345 damage in an area. Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50%.

basic.name: Living Bomb (W)
basic.description: Deal 126 damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing 215 damage to all nearby enemies.  Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread.Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.

basic.name: Gravity Lapse (E)
basic.description: Stun the first enemy hit for 1 second. Verdant Spheres causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first 3 enemies hit and increases the stun duration by 50%.

heroic.name: Phoenix (R)
heroic.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 84 damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 84 damage and splashing for 42 damage.

heroic.name: Pyroblast (R)
heroic.description: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 damage to an enemy Hero and 405 damage to enemies nearby.

trait.name: Verdant Spheres (T)
trait.description: Activate to make Kael'thas's next Basic Ability more powerful. {highlight}You can reactivate Verdant Spheres to consume it and restore 7.5% of your maximum mana{/highlight}

1.name: Convection
1.description: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death.Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death. {highlight}Hitting 4 heros with a Flame Strike completes the quest and increases Kael'Thas maximum mana by 100.{/highlight}

1.name: Mana Cubes
1.description: {highlight}Drops a mana cube that restores allied hero maximum mana by 5% of Kael'thas maximum mana to the first allied hero that enters in contact every time Kael'thas uses an ability or get a regeneration globe. Passive: Verdant Spheres cooldown is decreased by 3{/highlight}

1.name: Mana Addict
1.description: {highlight}When Kael'thas has more than 80% of his maximum mana he receives 15% extra spell power but have 15% less spell power when his mana is lower than 25%.{/highlight}

4.name: Nether Wind
4.description: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.

4.name: Banish Lapse
4.description: {highlight}Exile enemy heros currently affected by Gravity Lapse making them unable to be targeted by allied heroes. Also reduces their spell armor by 15 while affected{/highlight}

4.name: Mana Drain
4.description: {highlight}Drain the Mana from an enemy hero over 3 seconds. Draining 8% of the target current mana per second and restoring Kael'thas 8% maximum mana per second and half of his mana value to close heores.{/highlight}

7.name: Burned Flesh
7.description: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage equal to 8% of their maximum Health.

7.name: Sun King's Fury
7.description: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal 35% more damage.

7.name: Mana Shield
7.description: {highlight}Kael'thas can activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Mana for 4 seconds.{/highlight}
passives: {highlight}Basic attacks against enemy heros increase Kael'Thas magic mana by 5 permanently{/highlight}

10.name: Phoenix
10.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 84 damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 84 damage and splashing for 42 damage.

10.name: Pyroblast
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 damage to an enemy Hero and 405 damage to enemies nearby.

13.name: Pyromaniac
13.description: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, Kael'thas's Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Backdraft
13.description: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemy Movement Speed by {highlight}99%{/highlight} for {highlight}1.0 seconds{/highlight}, {highlight}decaying over the duration.{/highlight}

13.name: Fission Bomb
13.description: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.

16.name: Fury of the Sunwell
16.description: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.

16.name: Ignite
16.description: Flamestrikes apply Living Bomb to the enemy Hero closest to its center who is not currently affected by Living Bomb.

16.name: Felo'Melorn
16.description: {highlight}Kael'thas swings his sword Felo'melorn, dealing 126 damage to nearby heroes and shooting a projectile that deals an extra 126 damage to the target hit, thus exploding the target's Living Bomb instantly with a 35% greater radius.{/highlight}

20.name: Arcane Phoenix
20.description: {highlight}Reactivate Phoenix with 80 mana cost with 80 mana cost to reposition it and increase it's duration by 2 seconds and it's attack speed by 20%. You can reposition it up to 10 times{/highlight}

20.name: Presence Of Mind
20.description: {highlight}Pyroblast have the radius increased by 100%. If Kael'thas reactivate Pyroblast while it's active it will instead split create smaller versions of Pyroblast targeting every hero on the radius dealing 65% of the Pyroblast damage.{/highlight}

20.name: Master of Flames
20.description: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

20.name: Flamethrower
20.description: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If Flamestrike hits 2 or more Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.
